channel.title: OGLplus news
channel.description: The latest news from OGLplus.org site.

item.title: OGLplus 0.36.0 released.
item.description: New release packages are available for download from SourceForge.

item.title: OGLplus 0.35.0 released.
item.description: New release packages are available for download from SourceForge.

item.title: OGLplus 0.34.0 released.
item.description: New release packages are available for download from SourceForge.

item.title: New shape generator added
item.description: The 'Cage' parametric mesh generator has been added.

item.title: New shape generator added
item.description: The 'TwistedTorus' parametric mesh generator has been added.

item.title: Screen space text rendering example added
item.description: An example showing object tracking via transform feedback and simple screen space text rendering has been pushed to the git repository.

item.title: OGLplus.org has an RSS feed!
item.description: Feed for OGLplus-related news about releases, new examples, tutorials, videos or screenshots, downloadable items like textures, models, sounds, fonts, etc.

item.title: OGLplus 0.33.0 released
item.description: New release packages are available for download from SourceForge.
